mapper.select: select * from user where userid=#{userid} and name = #{name }
mapper.insert: insert into user (userid, passwd, name, phone, email,domain, zip,address1,address2, year,month,day, joindate, state) values ( #{userid}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{domain}, #{zip}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, sysdate(), 1 )
mapper.select: select * from user where userid=#{userid} and state=1
mapper.update: update user set userdeldate=#{userdeldate}, state = 2, userdeldate=sysdate() where userid=#{userid}
